# caretSDM

Luíz Fernando Esser

# caretSDM

`caretSDM` is a under development R package that uses the powerful
`caret` package as the main engine to obtain Species Distribution
Models. As `caret` is a packaged turned to build machine learning
models, `caretSDM` has a strong focus on this approach.

## Installation

You can install the development version of caretSDM from
[GitHub](https://github.com/luizesser/caretSDM) with:

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("luizesser/caretSDM")
```

The package is also available on CRAN. Users are able to install it
using the following code:

``` r
install.packages("caretSDM")
```

## You need help?

caretSDM is vastly documented and has included some objects that can
guide your data management. If some of your data or code seem to be
wrong, try to take a look at those objects or the articles in the
website:

*Objects*

- `bioc` Bioclimatic variables for current scenario in stars class.

- `rivs` Hydrological variables for current scenario in sf class.

- `occ` *Araucaria angustifolia* occurrence data as a dataframe.

- `salm` *Salminus brasiliensis* occurrence data as a dataframe.

- `parana` Shapefile to use in `sdm_area` in Simple Feature class.

- `scen` Bioclimatic variables for future scenarios in stars class.

- `scen_rs` Bioclimatic variables for invasive assessments vignette.

- `algorithms` Dataframe with characteristics from every algorithm
  available in caretSDM.

*Articles*

- `Adding New Algorithms to caretSDM` do not found your ideal algorithm
  already implemented? Here we show how to implement any custom
  algorithm in our package.

- `caretSDM Workflow for Species Distribution Modeling` is the main
  vignette for terrestrial species modeling, where we model the tree
  species *Araucaria angustifolia*.

- `Concatenate functions in caretSDM` shows how to build compact
  scripts, which is very useful to run your first tests.

- `Projecting Non-native Distribution using SDMs` a vignette
  demonstrating how to make invasiveness assessments.

- `Modeling Species Distributions in Continental Water Bodies` is the
  main vignette for continental aquatic species modeling, where we model
  the fish species *Salminus brasiliensis*.

- `Modeling Rare Species using Ensemble of Small Models` we showcase how
  easy it is to apply SDMs to rare species with low number of records.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`GBIF_data()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/GBIF_data.md)
  : Retrieve Species data from GBIF

- [`WorldClim_data()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/WorldClim_data.md)
  : Download WorldClim v.2.1 bioclimatic data

- [`add_predictors()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/add_predictors.md)
  [`get_predictors()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/add_predictors.md)
  :

  Add predictors to `sdm_area`

- [`add_scenarios()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/add_scenarios.md)
  [`set_scenarios_names()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/add_scenarios.md)
  [`scenarios_names()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/add_scenarios.md)
  [`get_scenarios_data()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/add_scenarios.md)
  [`select_scenarios()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/add_scenarios.md)
  :

  Add scenarios to `sdm_area`

- [`algorithms`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/algorithms.md)
  : Caret Algorithms

- [`background()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/background.md)
  [`n_background()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/background.md)
  [`background_data()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/background.md)
  : Obtain Background data

- [`bioc`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/bioc.md) :
  Bioclimatic Variables

- [`buffer_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/buffer_sdm.md)
  : Create buffer around occurrences

- [`correlate_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/correlate_sdm.md)
  : Correlation between projections

- [`data_clean()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/data_clean.md)
  : Presence data cleaning routine

- [`gcms_ensembles()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/gcms_ensembles.md)
  : Ensemble GCMs into one scenario

- [`input_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/input_sdm.md)
  [`add_input_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/input_sdm.md)
  :

  `input_sdm`

- [`is_input_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/is_input_sdm.md)
  [`is_sdm_area()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/is_input_sdm.md)
  [`is_occurrences()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/is_input_sdm.md)
  [`is_models()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/is_input_sdm.md)
  [`is_predictions()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/is_input_sdm.md)
  :

  `is_class` functions to check caretSDM data classes.

- [`join_area()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/join_area.md)
  : Join Area

- [`occ`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/occ.md) :
  Araucaria angustifolia occurrence data

- [`occurrences_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/occurrences_sdm.md)
  [`n_records()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/occurrences_sdm.md)
  [`species_names()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/occurrences_sdm.md)
  [`get_coords()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/occurrences_sdm.md)
  [`occurrences_as_df()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/occurrences_sdm.md)
  [`add_occurrences()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/occurrences_sdm.md)
  : Occurrences Managing

- [`parana`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/parana.md) :
  Paraná State

- [`pca_predictors()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/pca_predictors.md)
  [`pca_summary()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/pca_predictors.md)
  [`get_pca_model()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/pca_predictors.md)
  : Predictors as PCA-axes

- [`pdp_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/pdp_sdm.md)
  [`get_pdp_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/pdp_sdm.md)
  : Model Response to Variables

- [`plot_occurrences()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/plot_occurrences.md)
  [`plot_grid()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/plot_occurrences.md)
  [`plot_predictors()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/plot_occurrences.md)
  [`plot_scenarios()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/plot_occurrences.md)
  [`plot_predictions()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/plot_occurrences.md)
  [`mapview_grid()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/plot_occurrences.md)
  [`mapview_occurrences()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/plot_occurrences.md)
  [`mapview_predictors()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/plot_occurrences.md)
  [`mapview_scenarios()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/plot_occurrences.md)
  [`mapview_predictions()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/plot_occurrences.md)
  [`plot_background()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/plot_occurrences.md)
  [`plot_niche()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/plot_occurrences.md)
  : S3 Methods for plot and mapview

- [`predict_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/predict_sdm.md)
  [`get_predictions()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/predict_sdm.md)
  [`get_ensembles()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/predict_sdm.md)
  [`add_predictions()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/predict_sdm.md)
  : Predict SDM models in new data

- [`prediction_change_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/prediction_change_sdm.md)
  : Prediction Change Analysis

- [`predictors()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/predictor_names.md)
  [`set_predictor_names()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/predictor_names.md)
  [`get_predictor_names()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/predictor_names.md)
  [`test_variables_names()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/predictor_names.md)
  [`set_variables_names()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/predictor_names.md)
  : Predictors Names Managing

- [`print(`*`<input_sdm>`*`)`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/print.input_sdm.md)
  : Print method for input_sdm

- [`print(`*`<models>`*`)`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/print.models.md)
  : Print method for models

- [`print(`*`<occurrences>`*`)`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/print.occurrences.md)
  : Print method for occurrences

- [`print(`*`<predictions>`*`)`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/print.predictions.md)
  : Print method for predictions

- [`pseudoabsences()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/pseudoabsences.md)
  [`n_pseudoabsences()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/pseudoabsences.md)
  [`pseudoabsence_method()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/pseudoabsences.md)
  [`pseudoabsence_data()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/pseudoabsences.md)
  : Obtain Pseudoabsences

- [`rivs`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/rivs.md) :
  Hydrologic Variables

- [`salm`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/salm.md) :
  Salminus brasiliensis occurrence data

- [`scen`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/scen.md) :
  Bioclimatic Variables

- [`scen_rs`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/scen_rs.md)
  : Bioclimatic Variables

- [`sdm_area()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/sdm_area.md)
  [`get_sdm_area()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/sdm_area.md)
  [`add_sdm_area()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/sdm_area.md)
  :

  Create a `sdm_area` object

- [`sdm_as_stars()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/sdm_as_stars.md)
  [`sdm_as_raster()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/sdm_as_stars.md)
  [`sdm_as_terra()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/sdm_as_stars.md)
  :

  `sdm_as_X` functions to transform `caretSDM` data into other classes.

- [`summary_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/summary_sdm.md)
  [`summary_sdm_presence_only()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/summary_sdm.md)
  [`validate_on_independent_data()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/summary_sdm.md)
  : Calculates performance across resamples

- [`select_predictors()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/tidyverse-methods.md)
  [`select(`*`<sdm_area>`*`)`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/tidyverse-methods.md)
  [`select(`*`<input_sdm>`*`)`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/tidyverse-methods.md)
  [`mutate(`*`<sdm_area>`*`)`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/tidyverse-methods.md)
  [`mutate(`*`<input_sdm>`*`)`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/tidyverse-methods.md)
  [`filter(`*`<sdm_area>`*`)`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/tidyverse-methods.md)
  [`filter(`*`<input_sdm>`*`)`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/tidyverse-methods.md)
  [`filter(`*`<occurrences>`*`)`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/tidyverse-methods.md)
  [`filter_species()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/tidyverse-methods.md)
  : Tidyverse methods for caretSDM objects

- [`train_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/train_sdm.md)
  [`get_tune_length()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/train_sdm.md)
  [`algorithms_used()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/train_sdm.md)
  [`get_models()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/train_sdm.md)
  [`get_validation_metrics()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/train_sdm.md)
  [`mean_validation_metrics()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/train_sdm.md)
  [`add_models()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/train_sdm.md)
  : Train SDM models

- [`tsne_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/tsne_sdm.md)
  : tSNE

- [`tuneGrid_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/tuneGrid_sdm.md)
  : Retrieve tuneGrid from models

- [`use_esm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/use_esm.md)
  : Ensemble of Small Models (ESM) in caretSDM

- [`use_mem()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/use_mem.md)
  : MacroEcological Models (MEM) in caretSDM

- [`varImp_sdm()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/varImp_sdm.md)
  : Calculation of variable importance for models

- [`vif_predictors()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/vif_predictors.md)
  [`vif_summary()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/vif_predictors.md)
  [`selected_variables()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/vif_predictors.md)
  : Calculate VIF

- [`write_ensembles()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/write_ensembles.md)
  [`write_predictions()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/write_ensembles.md)
  [`write_predictors()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/write_ensembles.md)
  [`write_models()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/write_ensembles.md)
  [`write_gpkg()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/write_ensembles.md)
  [`write_occurrences()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/write_ensembles.md)
  [`write_pseudoabsences()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/write_ensembles.md)
  [`write_grid()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/write_ensembles.md)
  [`write_validation_metrics()`](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/reference/write_ensembles.md)
  : Write caretSDM data

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Adding New Algorithms to
  caretSDM](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/articles/Add-Algorithm.md):
- [caretSDM Workflow for Species Distribution
  Modeling](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/articles/Araucaria.md):
- [Concatenate functions in
  caretSDM](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/articles/Compact.md):
- [Modeling Rare Species using Ensemble of Small
  Models](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/articles/ESM.md):
- [Projecting Non-native Distribution using
  SDMs](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/articles/InvasiveSpp.md):
- [Modeling Species Distributions in Continental Water
  Bodies](https://luizesser.github.io/caretSDM/articles/Salminus.md):
